item.title: Comment on Therapeutic Prescription by Anna Brown
item.dc:creator: Anna Brown
item.description: The book is worth every penny.

item.title: Comment on Medicine and Rehabilitation by Mia Queen
item.dc:creator: Mia Queen
item.description: I love this book! A must read!
item.content:encoded: I love this book! A must read!

item.title: Comment on Stroke Recovery Activity Book by Adam Gordon
item.dc:creator: Adam Gordon
item.description:
This book shows that there is hope for the many many people who suffer from trauma.
And what bigger gift can be given than hope.
item.content:encoded:
This book shows that there is hope for the many many people who suffer from trauma.

And what bigger gift can be given than hope.

item.title: Comment on Low Back Disorders by Adam Gordon
item.dc:creator: Adam Gordon
item.description: Everything this man writes is pure gold. He’s a healer and pioneer. His work has fundamentally changed and improved my life.
item.content:encoded: Everything this man writes is pure gold. He’s a healer and pioneer. His work has fundamentally changed and improved my life.

item.title: Comment on Textbook of Rehabilitation by Anna Brown
item.dc:creator: Anna Brown
item.description: Not an alternative to therapy, but as a first aid this book does its job well.
item.content:encoded: Not an alternative to therapy, but as a first aid this book does its job well.

item.title: Comment on Qualitative Research by Mia Queen
item.dc:creator: Mia Queen
item.description: This book was beautifully written. Very poetic but still readable.
item.content:encoded: This book was beautifully written. Very poetic but still readable.
